feed.title: Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:45 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 45 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023
